text: Arnold Carl Harberger (born July 27, 1924) is an American economist. He was born in Newark, New Jersey. Harberger is known for his triangle theory,Harberger's triangle at Market subwiki where the deadweight loss that may be caused by seller monopoly power, taxation. He is also known for his essays about predictions of the American GDP. ==References== ==Other websites== * Video Collection from NewMedia Universidad Francisco Marroqu√≠n Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Newark, New Jersey
title: Arnold Harberger
